fields.name: Asset
fields.description: The data asset input to be leveraged by the monitoring job..

fields.name: DataContext
fields.description: [Required] The context of the data source.

fields.name: PreprocessingComponentId
fields.description: The ARM resource ID of the component resource used to preprocess the data.

fields.name: TargetColumnName
fields.description: The target column in the given data asset to leverage.
